cards.title: M.E.M.E.
cards.description: A collaborative music project done with Microsoft Interns and FTEs
cards.longDescription: M.E.M.E. (standing for Microsoft Engineers Music Ensemble) was a summer project conducted with ~40 Microsoft interns and full-time employees. The project consisted of arranging, recording, and editing songs for three virtual performances over the course of a summer internship.

links.linkPretext: You can find all of our performances

cards.title: Shabu Animation
cards.description: A short 3D animation about Shabu the Hotpot
cards.longDescription: This animation was created the 60-125 Intro to 3D Animation course. Over the course of a semester, I designed, modeled, textured, rigged, and animated Shabu, a hotpot character residing in a snowy forest. The final result was a 30-second animated short of our character. This was my first time extensively workinng with Maya on a full character animation (my previous work with 3D animation have been very basic), and I really enjoyed the class!
